refer-subheader: Help us make a bigger impact, and gain a stake in our community
refer-desc: By sharing Socious with promising users and impact organizations, you're not just expanding our network, ou're also accelerating change.
refer-learn-more-link: Learn more about our referral program and how to claim rewards.
refer-org-subtitle: Send your link to organizations looking for purpose-driven rewards.
refer-org-referrer: 2000 THANK (approx. $14)  for every referral that completes KYB verification (also redeemable in 7 USDM)
refer-org-referee: 2000 THANK (approx. $14) for voting and completing KYB verification (also redeemable in 7 USDM)
refer-user-subtitle: Send your link to affiliates in your network looking to make a difference and earn rewards.
refer-user-referrer: 1100 (approx. $7) THANK for every referral that votes and completes KYC verification (also redeemable in 4 USDM)
refer-user-referee: 1100 THANK (approx. $7) for voting and completing KYC verification (also redeemable in 4 USDM)
refer-who-invited: has invited you to join Socious Fund.
refer-register: Register now to start voting and making an impact.
